alert.note: Alert for Union (South Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Sioux Falls (Southeastern SD, Southwestern MN, and Northwestern IA)
info.headline: Dense Fog Advisory issued December 03 at 9:48PM MST until December 04 at 8:00AM MST by NWS Sioux Falls
info.description: ...DENSE FOG ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 9 AM CST MONDAY... * WHAT...Visibility one quarter mile or less in dense fog. * WHERE...In Iowa, Lyon and Sioux Counties. In Minnesota, Lyon, Murray, Nobles and Rock Counties. In Nebraska, Dixon County. In South Dakota, Union County. * WHEN...Until 9 AM CST Monday. * IMPACTS...Hazardous driving conditions due to low visibility. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...With temperatures below freezing, dense freezing fog may create slick conditions on untreated surfaces, especially bridges and lesser traveled roads.
info.instruction: If driving, slow down, use your headlights, and leave plenty of distance ahead of you.
